metadata.name: The ShopKeeper
metadata.description:
Bottega presents the first exclusive drop for Founders!

The artwork is entitled "The ShopKeeper", created by Lele Gastini for Bottega.

The work shows the logo "B" for Bottega as an ethnic mask of the character.  
In the mask are illustrated 50 humans, which symbolize all the Founders of the group.  
On the bottom left there is a heart in red: the main colour of Bottega.


The reveal will take place on Christmas day and the mint will be free for all token holders until 12/31!
